ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A Little Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Jeff, This is always fun.  Try different varieties of this.  Things like this Take a new Lvl 5th Warrior 1 How many strikes does it take to get to the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Jeff,

This is always fun. Try different varieties of this. Things like this

Take a new Lvl 5th Warrior

1> How many strikes does it take to get to the center of the warrior (aka How many licks does it take to get the center of a lollipop)
2> Who can kill the warrior with one strike. Kinda like a pina colata. Win a price if you can hit him one he dies (might have to try a lower level character)
3> Pin The Tail On Grim Feather. (Only for the very brave) This is a classic.
4> Find Dragosothos' missing dragon named Fluffy. This is also an EQ Classic.
5> Ole Redneck Party. Just bring some farm animals...
6> MOB Lamba Train. Make it big a long.
7> Take "photos" of the guild and the undead cyclops charmed. Group shots are a plus.
8> Have a "cock" fight. Charm to avos and ahve them fight
9> Find Dragosothos' lost pet dragon

And the final one.....

10> Become the 1st everquest Nudist Guild

Paul

----- Original Message -----
From: Jeff Illian
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Friday, May 05, 2000 11:46 AM
Subject: [eqbards] A Little Help


First let me appologize if you get 4 or more copies of this. All the
mail servers are screwed up around here...

k, this is completely off topic BUT I need your help. My guild is
doing a joint guild event in South
Karana sometime in the near future (with 5 other guilds). I, being a
fun loving party bard, have been
appointed to the "events" committee. Problem is I'm not feeling very
creative today and I'm fresh out of
new and amusing ideas. I want to
try to do something fun that isn't the same old same old. I figure
the best place to go for some ideas
would be here! The home of the fun loving, party enhancing,
entertaining bard.

Thanks for you ideas in advance :)

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 50th song
Prexus

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
